desc: Bayfield Gardens is locally owned and operated and offers many options for your gardening wants and needs. We grow annuals, vegetables, hanging baskets, and color bowls to help satisfy the desire to have a summer garden. We also offer a wide variety of perennials specifically chosen to grow well in our area* whether

layout.text: Thank you for a great season!
We are closed for the season, but look forward to serving you again next spring!
